Equipment Actions.Action 1: Gore, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 18 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Hooves, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 16 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Petrifying Breath, The Gorgon exhales a petrifying gas in a cone.  Creatures caught in the area make a Constitution saving throw or begin being turned to stone and are restrained.  On a second failure, they become petrified

Abilities.Ability 1: Trampling Charge, If the Gorgon moves in a straight line and then hits a Gore attack, the hit target makes a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone
